item.title: Resumable Conversion from CSV File with Large Size (> 50 MB) to Several Spreadsheets by Splitting File
item.description: Gists Overview This is a sample script which can achieve the resumable conversion from the large CSV-file to several spreadsheets by splitting the CSV file using Google Apps Script (GAS). Description Is there a situation that you want to convert a CSV file with the large size (> 50 MB) to Spreadsheet? When such large CSV file is converted to Spreadsheet, you will experience the error. The reason is the size and/or also it may be due to the total cells (> 2,000,000 cells) of CSV file.
